languages.text: "Ты не поверишь — да. Дал одну вахту, туда и обратно. И вроде и хорошо, что ноги размял, а с другой стороны как поглядел на этот Футфол, так сразу же обратно на борт захотел..."

"You won't believe it, but he said yes. He gave me one watch, there and back again. I guess it was nice to stretch my legs, but a single look at Footfall made me want to get straight back on board..."
languages.original_text: "Ты не поверишь — да. Дал одну вахту, туда и обратно. И вроде и хорошо, что ноги размял, а с другой стороны как поглядел на этот Футфол, так сразу же обратно на борт захотел..."

traits.locale_text: "You won't believe it, but he did. He gave me one turn, there and back again. On the one hand, it felt real nice to stretch my feet, but on the other a single look at that Footfall made me want to get back on board…"

"You won't believe it, but he did. He gave me one turn, there and back again. On the one hand, it felt real nice to stretch my feet, but on the other a single look at that Footfall made me want to get back on board…"
"You won't believe it, but he said yes. He gave me one turn, there and back again. I guess it was nice to stretch my legs, but a single look at Footfall made me want to get straight back on board..."
"You won't believe it, but he said yes. He gave me one turn, there and back again. I guess it was nice to stretch my legs, but a single look at Footfall made me want to get straight back on board..."

"You won't believe it, but he said yes. He gave me one watch, there and back again. I guess it was nice to stretch my legs, but a single look at Footfall made me want to get straight back on board..."

languages.text: “说出来你恐怕也不会信，但他答应了。他给了我一巡的时间，让我放个假。我本来在想，出去伸伸腿总归是件好事，但我只看了落脚港一眼，就想赶紧回船上去……”
languages.original_text: "You won't believe it, but he said yes. He gave me one watch, there and back again. I guess it was nice to stretch my legs, but a single look at Footfall made me want to get straight back on board..."

traits.locale_text: “说出来你恐怕也不会信，但他答应了。他给了我一巡的时间，让我放个假。我本来在想，出去伸伸腿总归是件好事，但我只看了落脚港一眼，就想赶紧回船上去……”

languages.text: «Pues igual no me crees, pero sí. Me dejó libre una guardia, el tiempo justo para ir y volver. Estuvo bien poder estirar las piernas, pero me bastó una mirada a Paso para querer volver a bordo...».
languages.original_text: "You won't believe it, but he said yes. He gave me one watch, there and back again. I guess it was nice to stretch my legs, but a single look at Footfall made me want to get straight back on board..."

traits.locale_text: «Pues igual no me crees, pero sí. Me dejó libre una guardia, el tiempo justo para ir y volver. Estuvo bien poder estirar las piernas, pero me bastó una mirada a Paso para querer volver a bordo...».

languages.text: 「信じられないだろうけど、許可してくれたよ。時計を1つくれて、俺は船を一度降りて帰ってきた。羽を伸ばすのも良かったけど、フットフォールを一目見たら、船に帰りたくなったね…」
languages.original_text: "You won't believe it, but he said yes. He gave me one watch, there and back again. I guess it was nice to stretch my legs, but a single look at Footfall made me want to get straight back on board..."

traits.locale_text: 「信じられないだろうけど、許可してくれたよ。時計を1つくれて、俺は船を一度降りて帰ってきた。羽を伸ばすのも良かったけど、フットフォールを一目見たら、船に帰りたくなったね…」

languages.text: "Ihr werdet es nicht glauben, aber er hat Ja gesagt. Eine Wachschicht lang, rein und wieder raus. Es war zwar schön, sich mal die Beine zu vertreten, aber nach einem einzigen Blick auf Footfall wollte ich sofort wieder an Bord gehen ..."
languages.original_text: "You won't believe it, but he said yes. He gave me one watch, there and back again. I guess it was nice to stretch my legs, but a single look at Footfall made me want to get straight back on board..."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet es nicht glauben, aber er hat Ja gesagt. Eine Wachschicht lang, rein und wieder raus. Es war zwar schön, sich mal die Beine zu vertreten, aber nach einem einzigen Blick auf Footfall wollte ich sofort wieder an Bord gehen ..."

languages.text: « Tu vas pas le croire, mais il a accepté. Juste le temps de faire l'aller-retour. C'était pas désagréable de me dégourdir les jambes, mais il m'a suffi d'un seul coup d'œil à Castel pour avoir envie de remonter à bord aussi sec... »
languages.original_text: "You won't believe it, but he said yes. He gave me one watch, there and back again. I guess it was nice to stretch my legs, but a single look at Footfall made me want to get straight back on board..."

traits.locale_text: « Tu vas pas le croire, mais il a accepté. Juste le temps de faire l'aller-retour. C'était pas désagréable de me dégourdir les jambes, mais il m'a suffi d'un seul coup d'œil à Castel pour avoir envie de remonter à bord aussi sec... »

languages.text: "İnanmayacaksın ama evet dedi. Git gel yaptığım bir nöbet yazdı. Bacaklarımı esnettim, iyi oldu ama Binliman'a bir kere bakmam, hemen gemiye dönmeyi istememe yetti de arttı."
languages.original_text: "You won't believe it, but he said yes. He gave me one watch, there and back again. I guess it was nice to stretch my legs, but a single look at Footfall made me want to get straight back on board..."

traits.locale_text: "İnanmayacaksın ama evet dedi. Bana gidip gelmelik bir tane nöbet yazdı. Bacaklarımı esnettim, iyi oldu ama Binliman'a bir kere bakmam, hemen gemiye dönmeyi istemem için yetti de arttı."
